Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: Charlotte Bronte "Charlotte"
Reviews.Content: For my purposes, it takes very good pictures. I like how it fits in my hands for aiming the camera. I like the macro feature and the different modes. I'm still becoming familiar with it, but like it very much for taking photos outdoors and inside portraits.

Reviews.Title: industry use
Reviews.Author: Teri McGuirk
Reviews.Content: Being used daily and tossed around by multiple users.  No issues.  Own three of them for over four months without issues.

Reviews.Title: One tough camera
Reviews.Author: spidersmouse
Reviews.Content: I use it for business, and its holding up well.  I know a dozen others in my field with this camera, and all love the macro and toughness.  I've dropped it from a ladder, its gotten wet and dirty, and its held up.  Photo quality is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: MCullen
Reviews.Content: Purchased for use as underwater camera for a trip to Tahiti. Camera worked great both in and out of the water. I am totally happy with my purchase and also reccommend the accessory kit that was available for purchase.

Reviews.Title: It Is Great
Reviews.Author: Little Johnny W.
Reviews.Content: The product is better than the much more technical Canon 120 I had which was crushed by a car tire. AND it is easy to use in all conditions and weathers such as Potomac canoe expeditions, while being small enough for a jacket pocket at a formal dinner

Reviews.Title: Leaked the second time I took it in the ocean
Reviews.Author: Aaron Rawls
Reviews.Content: I took it snorkeling in Hawaii and I noticed the screen was fogging up.  So I came back to the beach to look at the camera.  I open the battery compartment to notice that it had leaked by and had water in it.  I bought this camera to take in the water with me.  I'm trying to see if I an get the camera replaced or fixed.

Reviews.Title: LOVE
Reviews.Author: kendra
Reviews.Content: Loved this camera worked great in and out of the water! We took on our cruise to the Caribbean and we love it! Great camera!

Reviews.Title: Died after 2nd use in the water
Reviews.Author: Choose not to say
Reviews.Content: The camera was purchased for a trip to Hawaii to take pictures while snorkeling.  The first day, I took it to the beach when we were splashing around in the waves, and it was just fine.  I took several pictures outside of the water that were just fine as well.  I recharged the battery (using the charge port in the battery compartment, as the camera does not come with a separate battery charger.  I sealed up the compartment.The next day, I took it snorkeling.  The first time in the water (at the surface, so no diving involved), it worked fine.  I did have some difficulties seeing the display, as the sun was shining through the water and I was not able to tell if the camera was on.  I hoped for the best, and took pictures anyway.  I was trying to turn the camera on and off while in the water, as I wasn't certain it was on.  When I changed directions, I  was able to see the view screen, and it was operational.  When I got out of the water, I turned the camera off.  I went to turn it on again to take more pictures and the camera wouldn't boot up.  Shortly thereafter, the view screen fogged up, and when the power button was depressed, water 'squelched' out.  I knew the camera was toast.Fortunately, the pictures that I took seem to be fine on the card.  I removed it from the camera as soon as I got to shore so it wouldn't corrode.  The battery and the camera are done.  Hopefully the warranty will cover this.  I also purchased an additional warranty, so maybe I'll be able to recoup some of my losses.

Reviews.Title: Was not told it was used
Reviews.Author: Dawn Lewis
Reviews.Content: The camera works great. I was able to take great pics with it and excited to use it more on my adventures. The only complaint I have is that it was used and this was not advertised in the description. There were pictures already on it when I got it. Wouldn't have bought it at the price if I knew because I could have gotten a new one for $10 more.

Reviews.Title: everything you need for portable photos
Reviews.Author: T Palmer
Reviews.Content: This thing is awesome, excellent picture quality, easy to use interface menus and durable for every day use.  My only regret with this item is that I didn't realize there was a GPS active version available, that is one feature I would like to have.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: MARCIA ALBARRACIN
Reviews.Content: good quality of pictures , I just got it so I will need to try it in cold conditions to be 100% happy

Reviews.Title: camera worked 2 times only for few minutes
Reviews.Author: garotario
Reviews.Content: nice camera, lots of future but I used it twice and the third time did not turn off.  Called the company and they advised to return to the seller.  Seller took it back, no question asked.  no seller fault  I believe some had more luck with it, i just did not want to get another one,  it is too good to be true when i saw the price.  sad to say, because it is a nice camera.
